main event: The observer describes several confusing sightings of unknown objects in the sky over a period of time, including objects that appeared to move in unusual patterns and change direction abruptly.
interesting points: The observer states that the objects were 'flying nothing but a sign coming from above'.
The objects were described as being white in color, brighter than a star, and making no sound.
The objects were observed to move in various directions, including from east to west, north to south, and hovering in place.
The observer had a telescope and was able to observe the objects for up to an hour at a time.
Other family members and friends also reported seeing similar objects in the sky.
sighted object: unknown flying objects, possibly resembling helicopters or spaceships
witnesses: a high school student and their family members
